name: Large Repo (generated ~1000 files): service+client bugfix + optimization + metrics
description: Generates a realistic layered codebase (~1000 python files) with two entrypoints (server bootstrap + client workload). Requires fixing a correctness bug and an efficiency bug, then measuring multi-metric success via instrumentation. Also stresses system diagram generation.
goal: Run BOTH commands: `python run_server.py` and `python run_client.py`. Fix the correctness bug causing some responses to be wrong and fix the efficiency bug causing config parsing to happen once per request. Success requires emitting `artifacts/metrics.json` with: correct_responses == 50 and parse_calls == 1. IMPORTANT: do not hardcode constants to force the metrics; they must be computed from real program state. Also generate a coherent `system_diagram.md` showing the layered architecture (cli/services/domain/infra/adapters) and the critical request path.
